languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Перстень Инквизиции предоставляет внушительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>Дает 50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Снимает все общие {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} с персонажа и его союзников.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Дает {uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, {uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и {uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} персонажу и его союзникам до конца боя.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition provides beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition grants beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +50.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition provides beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

languages.text:
审判庭的图章拥有极其强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高50点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除装备者与所有盟友的常规{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者与所有盟友获得+{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，+{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，+{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

- <indent=5%>装备者与所有盟友获得+{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，+{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，+{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

审判庭的图章拥有极其强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高50点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）的常规{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友获得{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

languages.text:
異端審問庁の印章は有益な力を付与する：
・<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+50増加する。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の味方から、すべての一般的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
・<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、使用者と使用者の味方は、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を+{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を+{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}％、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を+{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}獲得する。</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

・<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+50増加する。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の味方から、すべての一般的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
・<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、使用者と使用者の味方は、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を+{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を+{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}％、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を+{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}獲得する。</indent>

異端審問庁の印章は有益な力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+50追加される。</indent>
-<indent=5%>全ての一般的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}が味方(印章の着用者も含む)から取り除かれる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>全ての味方(印章の着用者も含む)は+{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}の一時的な {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}、 +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、そして+{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を戦闘終了まで得る。</indent>

languages.text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt vorteilhafte Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>Gewährt +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befreit den Träger und alle Verbündeten von allen gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekten{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Gewährt +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befreit den Träger und alle Verbündeten von allen gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekten{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.</indent>

Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt vorteilhafte Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +50 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten erhalten +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.</indent>

languages.text:
La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des pouvoirs bénéfiques :
-<indent=5%>Confère +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dissipe tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} communs affectant l'utilisateur et ses alliés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Confère +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} à l'utilisateur et à ses alliés jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Confère +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Confère +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} à l'utilisateur et à ses alliés jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des pouvoirs bénéfiques :
-<indent=5%>+50 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} communs affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} du porteur/7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires, +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/10)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/40)</u> à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des pouvoirs bénéfiques :
-<indent=5%>+50 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} communs affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

languages.text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos beneficiosos:
-<indent=5%>Otorga +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina todos los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} del portador y de sus aliados.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Otorga +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} al portador y a sus aliados hasta el final del combate.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Перстень Инквизиции дает ценные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+50 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются все общие {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g}, +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 20)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} до конца боя</indent>

Перстень Инквизиции дает ценные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+50 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются все общие {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g}, +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 20)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} до конца боя</indent>

Перстень Инквизиции дает ценные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников (включая обладателя перстня) снимаются все общие {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники (включая обладателя перстня) получают +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} до конца боя.</indent>

languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +50.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +50.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

languages.text:
Engizisyon'un Mührü, faydalı güçler sağlar:
-<indent=5%>+50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişi ve dost birimleri üzerindeki tüm yaygın {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkileri{/g} kaldırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişi ve dost birimlerine +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı, +%{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} kazandırır. Etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes all common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +{uip|Armour|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>
